How does it work

Using the SilverLink user dashboard

SilverLink makes all activity data visible on an easy to use online dashboard. It is your one-stop monitoring platform.


  • a. Installation and set up
  • b. Staying connected with your loved ones
  • c. Using user dashboard
  • d. Using pendant
  • e. Advanced data analytics
    • Fall prediction
    • health progression monitoring
